subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The Phillies’ J.C. Romero was suspended 50 games for using a supplement created by a former Balco chemist. A Yankees minor league pitcher was also suspended for using a banned substance.
snippet: The Phillies’ J.C. Romero was suspended 50 games for using a supplement created by a former Balco chemist. A Yankees minor league pitcher was also suspended for using a banned substance.
